item.title: Statistical tests, P values, confidence intervals, and power: a guide to misinterpretations
item.description: Sander Greenland, Stephen J Senn, Kenneth J Rothman, John B Carlin, Charles Poole, Steven N Goodman, Douglas G Altman “Statistical tests, P values, confidence intervals, and power: a guide to misinterpretations” (2016) // European Journal of Epidemiology. Vol. 31. No 4. Pp. 337–350.
